Row.Text: May move over both land and sea tiles.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]May move over both land and sea tiles.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]May move over both land and sea tiles.
Unit specialized in fighting Modern Armor and Tanks. It is capable of hovering over all land tiles including mountains, and can cross oceans without embarking.

The Helicopter Gunship is a deadly Air Unit, which can hover over all terrain types including mountains, and it can cross oceans without having to embark. Helicopter Gunships receive a hefty combat bonus when fighting tanks. However, as an Air Unit, it cannot capture Cities or pillage tiles. It's a highly mobile Unit with a lot of Movement and it also receives additional Sight, making it very useful as a recon Unit in the late game. Use it for fighting against tanks and for gaining extra visibility in the battlefield.
